translations: n.保留剧目轮演剧团（repertory  的复数）

sentences.sentence: All of them represent Brahms' thought of art. Nowadays when we judge Brahms' piano music again, his masterpieces are outstanding productions in music historical repertories.
sentences.translation: 如今，重新审视勃拉姆斯的钢琴音乐，勃拉姆斯以兼容通变的艺术思维为钢琴音乐的历史宝库增添了优秀的成果。
